title: NEED TOPLANER G1 PLUS
body:
need toplaner gold 1 to plat 3 to grind dynamic 5 q, this is the last spot needed for the team
must have a mic and discord, add me on particuiate or post below with ur champ pool.

replies.body: I was plat but didnt play for a bit so I got demoted but back on now I play {{champion:245}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:240}}  Or others hit me up in game,
